item.title: Yahoo made my day
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

Yahoo > Google = 70.7M results.
Google > Yahoo = 69.0M results.

What’s funnier is that I searched that from Google.

item.title: Yahoo made my day
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

[quote=“Unhandled, post:7, topic:322233”][quote author=eczema3 link=topic=418633.msg3076805#msg3076805 date=1261885308]

I’m pretty sure microsoft owns yahoo… so wtf is up with the ad.

pretty sure they don’t, so you’re an idiot.

Pretty sure they do, so you just made an ass of yourself.
[/quote]
Hahaha, pretty sure you just got owned by an April fools joke.[/quote]
As did I.

Read full topic

item.title: Yahoo made my day
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

[quote=“eczema3, post:3, topic:322233”][quote author=Unhandled link=topic=418633.msg3076802#msg3076802 date=1261885153]

I’m pretty sure microsoft owns yahoo… so wtf is up with the ad.

pretty sure they don’t, so you’re an idiot.
[/quote]
Pretty sure they do, so you just made an ass of yourself.

TechJaws - SEO, Computer Security, Technology – 1 Apr 09

Microsoft Buys Yahoo! - TechJaws - SEO, Computer Security, Technology

In a long battle and now a victory, Microsoft will try to gain market share in the search business, the reality is finally here! CEO – Steve Ballmer confirmed the purchase Tuesday at 10:49 PM PST for an estimated cost of 39 billion dollars. This is a...


http://www.google.co.uk/searchq=microsoft+buys+yahoo+2009
Google say 148m results.[/quote]

You can’t tell if something is true by the amount of Google results. That news post is faked (look at the date - April fool’s day). In fact, Microsoft do not own Yahoo, but they are planning a 10 year agreement with them (still to be finalised) allowing them to use some of Yahoo’s search technology in Bing.

Read full topic
